title: Draft 137 promotion to production (no code change) + production smoke check documentation

requirements.summary: Document the promotion of Draft Version 137 to the live (production) canister as a zero-change action (no code or schema changes).
acceptanceCriteria: The live (production) canister is updated to match Draft Version 137.
No frontend or backend code changes are introduced as part of the promotion.
No backend schema/state migration is performed as part of the promotion.

file_operations.description: Create a Draft 137 redeploy/promotion assertion document explicitly stating this is a promotion-only action with zero frontend/backend code changes and no schema/state migration, mirroring the structure of prior DRAFT_*_REDEPLOY_ASSERTION.md files.

Create a Draft 137 redeploy/promotion note document (based on frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_TEMPLATE.md style) to capture production promotion metadata, executed deployment steps (placeholders only), and any verbatim error output, without introducing any application code changes.

requirements.summary: Add a production post-promotion smoke-check checklist specifically covering app load, Internet Identity login/logout, actor initialization stability, profile gating behavior, and submission proficiency tooltip rendering (including Purple belt).
acceptanceCriteria: The app loads on production with no uncaught console errors.
Users can log in via Internet Identity and reach the dashboard if a profile exists.
If a profile does not exist, the user is routed to profile setup without flicker loops.
Submission proficiency tooltips render (including Purple belt) and do not crash the UI.

file_operations.description: Create a Draft 137 smoke-check checklist modeled after frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_135.md but expanded to include: (1) initial app load checks, (2) Internet Identity login and logout checks, (3) actor initialization confirmation (no initialization trap/stuck state), (4) profile gating verification (profile setup vs dashboard, no flicker loops), and (5) submission proficiency tooltip rendering verification including Purple belt, with sections to paste console/network errors verbatim.
